item.title: SolarWinds Orion Supply Chain Attack: C2, Mitigations, and Expert Guidance
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "SolarWinds" , "Supply Chain" , "C2" , "Command and Control" , "Mitigations" , "Guidance" , "Threat Intelligence" , "DHS" , "FireEye" , "MSRC" , "Microsoft" , "SANS" , "SolarWinds.Orion.Core.BusinessLayer.dll" , "SolarWinds.BusinessLayerHost.exe" , "ConfigurationWizard.exe" , "NetflowDatabaseMaintenance.exe" , "NetFlowService.exe" , "SolarWinds.Administration.exe" , "SolarWinds.Collector.Service.exe" , "DNS CNAMEs" , "IP Ranges" , "DNS Names"
item.description: Learn about the SolarWinds Orion Supply Chain Attack, including the C2 malware, mitigations, and expert guidance from organizations like DHS and FireEye.
